name: nodebb-plugin-mailchimp
readme:
# NodeBB MailChimp plugin

This NodeBB plugin submits newly registered users to your mailchimp account, using the [MailChimp API 2.0](http://apidocs.mailchimp.com/api/2.0/).

To enter your MailChimp API key and list_id see the "Mailchimp" page in the administration panel, under the "Plugins" heading.

## Installation

    npm install nodebb-plugin-mailchimp
